data.message: 1st thing  when I first check onto face book, it says sorry page is not here or I have been kicked off . That's not true. 2nd The zoom keeps getting big to getting small,it wont stay put. 3rd I keep getting kicked off posts that I am responding to and those posts never come back. My sight is so jumpy.

replies.message: Hey, Paula. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2kgKAG4. -Rhea
